« 2:50 » Kempton (AW)

SAT 27 MAR 2010

williamhill.com Rosebery Handicap (CLASS 2) (4yo+ 0-105) Winner £21,809CH4

Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

DANSILI DANCER has plenty of solid handicap form to his name, should get a good pace to run at and has the assistance of a promising apprentice.
